Rules.response: Hello! I am a simple chatbot.

response: Okay, what do you want to learn more about? C#, Java or maybe JavaScript?
For C#, you can check out this link: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/
For Java, you can check out this link: https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/
For JavaScript, you can check out this link: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript

DefaultResponses: Hello! How can I help you?
I did not quite catch that, but I will try to keep up!
Would you like to learn more about C#?
Alright, here is the C# documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/
